text: I visited the clinic for acupuncture and massage therapy, and I had a wonderful experience. Ma Ping, the therapist, was both professional and friendly, taking the time to explain the treatments in detail. The clinic itself is clean, calming, and very comfortable. I highly recommend this TCM clinic to anyone looking for effective natural healing solutions.

I brought my mum to Curative Medicare for treatment of her leg pain, and we couldn’t be more pleased with the service from the female Tcm doctor, her knowledgeable and skilled TCM practitioner, provided excellent care. She took the time to understand my mum’s condition and explained each step of the treatment plan thoroughly. Thanks to her expertise, my mum’s leg pain has improved significantly. We are very grateful for the professional .Highly recommend Curative Medicare

A legitimate TCM clinic with registered doctor and therapists!

Even the front desk lady is trained and able to judge my medical condition, followed by proper treatment by an experienced therapist. I was there for a knee injury after my holiday overseas. After physical examination, treatment was extended to my back, which was diagnosed as related. I am able to walk properly with minimum pain at my knee and felt much better. Treatment process is careful and different from many other TCM which exerts stronger forces which causes pain.

Clinic ambiance is soothing and good for treatment. I actually slept after a little while into treatment. Price is reasonable and all staff is friendly and helpful.

Do make appointment if anyone wants to visit as the bookings are normally full.

I was seeing Dr Lee for skin issues at her previous clinic which the Chinese medicine prescribed had really improved the conditions.
Knowing that they moved here and also have tuina services I tried and it really eased up the soreness in my lower back and improved my posture. I’ve been coming back weekly.
Everyone there was friendly and patient in explaining my conditions.
The location is convenient and highly recommend for people looking for TCM treatment.
I’ve been to this TCM a sprained ankle, and I’m already seeing great results. The staff are friendly and knowledgeable, and the treatments are making a real difference. Highly recommended
